name: Star Ocean: The Last Hope
description:
Star Ocean: The Last Hope is a RPG game developed by tri-Ace Corporation. It was originally released in 2009. Square Enix published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
Star Ocean: The Last Hope is available on PlayStation 3.
It was produced by Hajime Kojima and Yoshinori Yamagishi. It was directed by Mitsuo Iwao. Motoi Sakuraba scored the game.
